title: How to build Skia Sharp for only specific purposes? (e.g. for Font rendering only)
body: I'd like to build a skia sharp library file (dynamic/shared) that will only be used for Font rendering, thus reducing the size of my program's dependencies. However, I am unable to find a way to configure Skia Sharp to only include certain parts of it and would like to know if there is any guide I can follow for this.
